setSphericalCoord

public static final void setSphericalCoord(double lon,
                                           double lat,
                                           double[] a)
Convert a longitude/latitude to cartesian coordinates

Parameters:
lon - longitude, unit is degree multiplied by unit.DDBuffer (default is 1000000).
lat - latitude, unit is degree multiplied by unit.DDBuffer (default is 1000000).
a - destination
See Also:
Ptolemy3DUnit.DD
